subject: Marathon Running
Boston Marathon
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Geoffrey Mutai’s time, 2 hours 3 minutes 2 seconds, is not considered an official world record, however, because the course is not record-eligible.
snippet: Geoffrey Mutai’s time, 2 hours 3 minutes 2 seconds, is not considered an official world record, however, because the course is not record-eligible.
